reviewText: This is a very enjoyable VHS recording of Kiri Te Kanawa's appearance in the Coventry Cathedral program.

My all-time favorite Christmas special.
The setting is lovely, the singing and musical selections are marvelous and there is a genuine "sense of occasion".
I can only hope that this will be tranferred to dvd in time for next Christmas...
Buy this with confidence--relax and enjoy.
Treasurable.
